snippet: The couple, who both graduated from Columbia cum laude, met at the university’s summer program in Beijing.
lead_paragraph: Annie Youxi Ma and Jacob Haft Weaver were married Saturday at St. Paul's Chapel on the campus of Columbia University in New York. Bettina Yiannakourou, a Universal Brotherhood minister, performed a ceremony that included Jewish and Methodist elements. The couple, both 24, graduated cum laude from Columbia and met at the university's summer program in Beijing. They will both use the surname Ma-Weaver.
